code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL;export const fetchClimateChanges=async()=>{return await axios.get(API_URL);};export const fetchClimateChangeById=async id=>{return await axios.get(`${API_URL}/${id}`);};export const fetchDisasterById=async id=>{return await axios.get(`${API_URL}/disaster/${id}`);};export const fetchAllClimateChanges=async()=>{return await axios.get(API_URL);};
